channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8280056] gtest/LargePageGtests.java#use-large-pages failed "os.release_one_mapping_multi_commits_vm"
item.description:
The following test failed in my stress testing of jdk-18+31:

gtest/LargePageGtests.java#use-large-pages

Here's a snippet from the log file:

[ RUN ] os.release_one_mapping_multi_commits_vm
A
Range [7f129cc2e000-7f129dc2e000) contains: 7f129cc2e000-7f129d02e000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0
7f129d02e000-7f129d42e000 ---p 00000000 00:00 0
7f129d42e000-7f129d82e000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0
7f129d82e000-7f129dc2e000 ---p 00000000 00:00 0

B
Range [7f129cc2e000-7f129dc2e000) contains: nothing.
open/test/hotspot/gtest/runtime/test_os.cpp:504: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  p2
    Which is: NULL
  p
    Which is: 0x7f129cc2e000
[ FAILED ] os.release_one_mapping_multi_commits_vm (49 ms)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/2325
Date: 2024-03-25 14:26:31 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/406
Date: 2024-03-25 14:25:20 +0000

Fix request [17u.21u]

I backport this because we see it failing in our CI.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.
We observed a similar failure in jdk21 on Linux ppc64le recently; is it planned (and would it help) to backport the fix to 21 ?

Changeset: 66520be7
Author: Afshin Zafari <azafari@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-01-12 08:21:42 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/66520be7a752ebade6c88d164bc87c4bfcfce40a

Here's the log from my jdk-22+20 stress run sighting on linux-x64:

$ unzip -l jdk-22+20_linux-x64.8280056.zip
Archive: jdk-22+20_linux-x64.8280056.zip
  Length Date Time Name
--------- ---------- ----- ----
    32853 2023-10-22 13:11 jdk-22+20_3/failures.linux-x86_64/LargePageGtests_use-large-pages.jtr.release
--------- -------
    32853 1 file

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/16240
Date: 2023-10-18 10:07:46 +0000
Issue is still present in JDK20/21.

The issue still occurs ~every month as well in our internal tests. 2 Examples from JDK20 / 21 :

example JDK20, linux x86_64 Ubuntu22 :
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

java.lang.AssertionError: gtest execution failed; exit code = 2. the failed tests: [os::release_one_mapping_multi_commits_vm]

Runtime Triage: did not see this issue since JDK 19, closing as CNR

Added logs for a sighting in my jdk-19+12 stress testing:

gtest/LargePageGtests.java#use-large-pages-sysV
